item.title: Ops-Talks #01
item.description: Ops-Talks #01 Ops-Talks comes from a desire to knowledge transfert +6 years worth of Ops knowledge / practice / tips & tricks to my fellow GumGum teammates.

item.title: Karrot Lag Reporting At Scale
item.description: Karrot Lag reporting Karrot is a simple Python Flask Webapp that ingests Burrow events sent by Burrow Notifiers which responds to consumer group status evaluations and makes HTTP calls to an outside server, Karrot.

item.title: Pritunl VPN - Multiregion peering
item.description: The Project Pritunl (https://pritunl.com) est une solution VPN d’entreprise open source distribuée.

item.title: Speaker at TIAD conference
item.description: TIAD (The Incredible Automation Day) Conference TIAD offers the time, the tools & space to understand Automation and all the theory & practice around it.

item.title: Ansible - Continuous Integration
item.description: The Project In order to ensure the accuracy of automations, testing is essential!

item.title: Ansible - Security with Vault
item.description: The Project Vault est une fonctionalité d’Ansible qui permet de conserver les données sensibles comme les mots de passe ou les clés dans les fichiers cryptés au lieu de les conserver en texte clair dans les playbooks et les roles.

item.title: Ansible Meetup
item.description: The Project After about a year working with Ansible, I decided to present and share my knowledge with this technology during a public Meetup with the Ansible-Los-Angeles group in at the Santa Monica Public Library.

item.title: Cassandra - Interconnexion de clusters en multi-régions
item.description: The Project After having opened new datacenters in Ireland and in California, GumGum’s engineering team had to work on important architecture changes in order to optimize the response time of applications using the NoSql database Cassandra.

item.title: Fluentd Traitement de données temps réel
item.description: The Project Fluentd is an OpenSource data collector for unified logging layer.

item.title: Blog V2
item.description: The Project After about a year of life of this blog, I decided to re-develop it with Python.

item.title: Icinga2 Monitoring
item.description: The Project Icinga is a scalable and extensible monitoring system which checks the availability of resources, notifies users of outages and provides extensive BI data.

item.title: Ansible - Automatisation d'infrastructure
item.description: The Project I have been involved in building from scratch, a new automation plateform based on Ansible.

item.title: Logstash - Centralisation d'évènements
item.description: The Project I have had a chance to compare several centralized logging solutions in order to replace the current Splunk>Storm architecture.

item.title: Jenkins CI
item.description: The Project I have been involved in replacing the current continuous integration server named Bamboo (an Atlassian product) by an open source technology, Jenkins.

item.title: ArcheoSuite
item.description: The Project The Archeo Suite was developed for the archaeological service of Amiens.

item.title: Blog V1
item.description: The Project This blog has allowed me to get used to the Symfony 2 framework.

item.title: Bitmusic
item.description: The Project BitMusic is a software which gives you the ability to share and play songs with users connected to the same network (P2P).

item.title: Legend of Code
item.description: The Project Legends of code is a contest. Experts from D2SI (Paris - FRANCE) mobilized themself to build an hackathon for students who are in last year engineering school or university.

item.title: Snecma Vortex
item.description: The Project As a part of my assistant engineer internship at the Snecma (Safran group company), I worked on the structuring and the setting up of a data base which was designed to deals with exploitation results of rocket engine tests.

item.title: Les-Arts-De-La-Grimpe
item.description: The Project “Les Arts de la Grimpe” is a website developed for the rock climbing association of Flixecourt (Picardy - FRANCE).
